transcript.text:
￼














Template & Studio


Managing Images
Background

2 min
overview & purpose this tab allows the admin to add new images to be used as a background in the designer studio add a new background image you can see the listing of all the background images uploaded in the system for the designer studio from the admin >> designer studio >> images >> background tab to add a background image, click on the ‘+ add ’ button at the top right corner select the background category for the image and upload multiple images under that category at once designer studio view –
Did this page help you?
